name: [Threshold] macOS Discovery Storm (Internal Reconnaissance Surge)
description: Multiple 'Discovery' type security alerts occurred within a short period. An attacker is collecting system information.
author: HJ

name: [Threshold] macOS Critical Impact Sequence (Critical Activity Sequence)
description: Impact type alerts such as system recovery disablement and service disruption occurred consecutively. This may be a sign of ransomware.
author: HJ

name: [Threshold] macOS Credential Access Spike (Account Takeover Attempt Surge)
description: Credential Access related alerts surged within a short period.
author: HJ

name: [Threshold] macOS High Risk Alert Cluster (High-Risk Alert Cluster)
description: Multiple alerts with CRITICAL or HIGH Risk Level occurred within a short period.
author: HJ

name: [Threshold] macOS SSH Brute Force Attack (5 Failures) Detection
description: Credential Access alerts occurred 5 or more times within 5 minutes on a single host (target server) due to SSH brute force attack. Immediate response required.
query: kibana.alert.rule.tags: "attack.credential_access" AND kibana.alert.rule.name: "*Brute Force via ssh*"
author: HJ

name: [Threshold] macOS Lateral Movement Indicators (Lateral Movement Indicators)
description: Lateral Movement or Remote Services related alerts occurred 3 or more times on the same host within 10 minutes. This is the lateral movement stage of an APT attack.
author: HJ

name: [Threshold] macOS Privilege Escalation Attempts (Privilege Escalation Attempts)
description: Privilege Escalation related alerts occurred 3 or more times on the same host within 15 minutes. Repeated privilege escalation attempts detected.
author: HJ

name: [Threshold] macOS Persistence Establishment Attempts (Persistence Establishment Attempts)
description: Persistence related alerts occurred 3 or more times on the same host within 20 minutes. System persistence establishment attempts detected.
author: HJ

name: [Sequence] macOS Malware Kill Chain Pattern (Malware Kill Chain Pattern)
description: Detected when Initial Access → Execution → Persistence stage alerts occur sequentially on the same host within 30 minutes, with each alert's risk_score being high or above.
query:
sequence by host.name with maxspan=30m
  [any where kibana.alert.rule.tags : "attack.initial_access" and kibana.alert.risk_score >= 70]
  [any where kibana.alert.rule.tags : "attack.execution" and kibana.alert.risk_score >= 70]
  [any where kibana.alert.rule.tags : "attack.persistence" and kibana.alert.risk_score >= 70]
author: HJ

name: [Sequence] macOS Infostealer Kill Chain Pattern (Information Exfiltration Attack)
description: Detected when Discovery → Collection → Exfiltration stage alerts occur sequentially on the same host within 20 minutes, with each alert's risk_score being medium or above.
query:
sequence by host.name with maxspan=20m
  [any where kibana.alert.rule.tags : "attack.discovery"]
  [any where kibana.alert.rule.tags : "attack.collection"]
  [any where kibana.alert.rule.tags : "attack.exfiltration"]
author: june0320

name: Process Discovery via ps
description: Detects execution of the 'ps' command to enumerate running processes on macOS. Aggregates logs by TraceID to prevent noise.
query: aul.processImagePath:"/bin/ps" AND aul.eventMessage:"Retrieve User by ID"
author: HJ
false_positives: Legitimate administrative usage for debugging or system monitoring
Developer commands executed in terminal sessions

name: [Ransomware] Rapid Encryption Activity Detected (High Entropy)
description: Detects potential ransomware activity characterized by high entropy (>= 7.5) and low chi-square scores (<= 300). This rule excludes compressed files and triggers when 5 or more such events occur on a single host within a 5-minute window.
author: HJ
